description: This dataset encapsulates the financial records of 12 leading German companies, presenting a detailed compilation of quarterly data from 2017 to 2024.

Period.description: Time period of the financial data

Revenue.description: Total income generated by the company

Net Income.description: Profit or loss after all expenses have been deducted

Liabilities.description: Obligations or debts that the company owes

Assets.description: Total resources owned by the company

Equity.description: Value of the company's ownership interest

ROA (%).description: Return on Assets, a profitability ratio

ROE (%).description: Return on Equity, a profitability ratio

Debt to Equity.description: Ratio of total debt to total equity

percentage Debt to Equity.description: Percentage representation of debt to equity ratio
